#include<stdio.h>
#include<stdlib.h>
#include<math.h>
#include<string.h>
#include<time.h>
#include<ctype.h>
#include<limits.h>
 
#define MOD 1000000007LL
#define LL long long
#define ULL unsigned long long
#define MAX(a,b) ((a)>(b)?(a):(b))
#define MIN(a,b) ((a)<(b)?(a):(b))
#define ABS(x)   ((x)<0?-(x):(x))
//}
 
#define SIZE 1000001
char primes[SIZE]={0};
ULL sum[SIZE]={0};
 
void precompute(){
    ULL i,j;
    primes[0]=1;
    primes[1]=1;
    ULL m = (ULL) sqrt(SIZE);
 
    for ( i = 2; i <= m; i++){
        if (primes[i] == 0){
            for ( j = i * i; j <= SIZE; j += i){
                primes[j] = 1;
            }
        }
    }
 
 
    for(i=2;i<SIZE;i++){
     sum[i]=sum[i-1];
     if(!primes[i])
       sum[i]+=i;
    }
 
}//end precompute
void refresh(){
}
 
void doThis(){
 ULL low=0,up;
 scanf("%lld",&up);
 
    printf("%lld\n",sum[up-1]);
 
 
 
}//end doThis
 
 
int main(){
#ifdef amy
freopen("input.txt","r",stdin);
freopen("output.txt","w",stdout);
freopen("log.txt", "w", stderr);
#endif
    int t;
	precompute();
	//t=1;
	scanf("%d",&t);
	while(t--){
	    doThis();
    }//end while
#ifdef amy
fprintf(stdout, "\nTime taken : %.3lf   sec\n", (double) clock() /(CLOCKS_PER_SEC));
#endif
	return 0;
}//end main
